name: PACKED | OUT
description:
INTRODUCTION
PACKED | OUT is an isometric 3d narrative-driven game about a simple robot named 5C3-M0, on his first day of work on a factory line.

In this game you play as 5C3-M0, with his ability to lift and throw cardboard packages.
Someone is watching you. And he wants a FLAWLESS work from you.

COMMANDS
WASD -  Move the character around
Spacebar - Pick up/ Throw  Objects
K - ???

KNOWN ISSUES

Game Over in act 3 sometimes don't allow you to respawn after death.

CREDITS

This game was made by 4 people for Brackeys game jam 2020.1
it was very challenging to make it with the level of polish we had in mind for this, is intended to be a vertical slice, short but intense we hope.

Andrea Di Bartolo : 3D Art / Design / Minor coding

Samuele Padalino :  Coding

Claudio Scamporlino : Coding

Carmelo Ventimiglia : Game Design / Voice Acting / Audio / coding
